title: Paris/16th arrondissement
name: Peninsula Paris

reviews.content: this is the place to stay in vegas they have great comps friendly service and they also have great payouts have been staying here for over 20 years and i love the people that work here must be a great place to work because we see the same faces year after year give them 6 stars if i could
reviews.author: Mr. Stephen Romaguera

description: Opening in 2014, the meticulously hotel, known before the Second World War as the Hotel Majestic, has 200 rooms including 24 suites in this 19th century classic Haussman building.
